title: The application League of Lege has been blocked by your Graphics Hardware.
body:
it says in the notification bar application has been blocked from accessing graphics hardware i would love help is there anyone else having the same issue 
thx for help

replies.body: I'm not familiar with this issue, or specifically what the notification bar is.  Would you be able to share a screenshot or where exactly this is happening?  Let me know!

[Here is a screenshot](http://s17.postimg.org/gai1m8kr3/lolerror.png) on windows 10 action center notification bar.

I run into this problem from time to time, League is not that optimized to run on cards that are overclocked. Might have to use Debug Mode to set the clocks to standards. Try that in the Nvidia Control Panel if u have an nvidia card. Should run stable for awhile, just depends on the games.

Good luck!

P.S - I have an GTX 970 FTW, sometimes it runs well without the debug mode, but for stability reasons give it a try.
